title: Novel 2D structural material design: carbon–aluminium–boron nitrides (CC–(Al–B)N) and carbon–aluminium–gallium nitrides (CC–(Al–Ga)N) for optical and optoelectronic system applications
content:
Energy Adv., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4YA00308J, Paper
Open Access

V. W. Elloh, D. E. Anderson, D. Abbeyquaye, D. F. Ofosuhene, I. Arhin, Edwin Okoampa Boadu, A. Yaya, Eric K. K. Abavare
In this paper, two new 2D hybrid nanoheterostructures, namely AlN:CC:GaN:CC and AlN:CC:BN:CC, have been designed through density functional theory (DFT) methods.
